Uses of Package
graphpack.local

Packages that use graphpack.local
graphpack.local local service, client and node abstractions (bridge design pattern) 
graphpack.local.persistence abstract persistence implementors (bridge design pattern) 
graphpack.local.persistence.JDO3 contains concrete JDO 3.0.1 implementations of IClientStore, INodeStore and IEdgeStore
 
 

Classes in graphpack.local used by graphpack.local
Client
          a local client
delegates persistence to injected INodeStore
delegates connection to injected IConnectionManager
IClientFactory
          an injected client factory (see AssistedInject)
INodeFactory
          an injected node factory (see AssistedInject)
Node
          a local node
delegates persistence to injected IEdgeStore
delegates parsing to injected IParser
delegates task management to injected ITaskManager
 

Classes in graphpack.local used by graphpack.local.persistence
Client
          a local client
delegates persistence to injected INodeStore
delegates connection to injected IConnectionManager
Node
          a local node
delegates persistence to injected IEdgeStore
delegates parsing to injected IParser
delegates task management to injected ITaskManager
 

Classes in graphpack.local used by graphpack.local.persistence.JDO3
Client
          a local client
delegates persistence to injected INodeStore
delegates connection to injected IConnectionManager

          an injected client factory (see AssistedInject)

          an injected node factory (see AssistedInject)

          a local node
